description: Individual task involving answering 11 short answer questions on scientific papers about river management and delivering a 5-minute presentation on conservation of a specific Macquarie Marshes plant/animal.
Group task (4-6 students) presenting a 15-20 minute evaluation of adaptive management strategies for the Macquarie Marshes, focusing on vision, objectives, and monitoring plans for organisms.
Individual 1000-word written reflection summarizing daily learnings, practical experiences, and key takeaways from the course, submitted two weeks post-course.

item: Adaptive Management Plan for the Macquarie Marshes
description: Individual development of a management plan focusing on monitoring schedules and objectives for assigned organisms, submitted four weeks post-course.
